attributes.action: reinstate more local train services to stop at beeston staton in the eastmidlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more trains should be introduced at beeston station in the east midlands, while the train operating company as cut services to many of its smaller station, it is lookng at " making money"  when they should be Concentrating on their passengers, while i understand their actions to cut london services which stop there. they should be more local train to stop at beeston station be better than just pass thougth. they mite as well just close the smaller station as most of them as hardly no service at all so why not just " stop" more local train services at certain stations.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
